Bernard Giraudeau https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernard_Giraudeau 0 Bernard René Giraudeau (18 June 1947 – 17 July 2010) was a French actor, film director, scriptwriter, producer and writer. Bernard_René_Giraudeau ( 18_June_1947 – 17_July_2010 ) was a_French_actor , film_director , scriptwriter , producer_and_writer .
